statements: SELECT * FROM InfluenceTracking
SELECT era_name, era_id FROM InfluenceTracking WHERE era_id = 5
SELECT era_name, influence_description FROM InfluenceTracking WHERE era_id > 10 ORDER BY era_name DESC
SELECT * FROM InfluenceTracking WHERE era_name LIKE 'Industrial%'
SELECT DISTINCT era_id FROM InfluenceTracking ORDER BY era_id ASC
SELECT * FROM InfluenceTracking WHERE era_id = 1;
SELECT era_id, era_name FROM InfluenceTracking WHERE era_name LIKE 'Ancient%';
SELECT * FROM InfluenceTracking WHERE era_name IN ('Medieval', 'Renaissance');
SELECT era_name, LENGTH(influence_description) AS description_length FROM InfluenceTracking WHERE LENGTH(influence_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM InfluenceTracking ORDER BY era_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Musical_Eras;
SELECT era_name FROM Musical_Eras WHERE era_id = 2;
SELECT composition_id, composition_title FROM Music_Compositions WHERE era_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Music_Compositions WHERE composition_id = 5;
SELECT composition_title, era_name FROM Music_Compositions JOIN Musical_Eras ON Music_Compositions.era_id = Musical_Eras.era_id;
SELECT * FROM Musical_Eras WHERE era_id = 1;
SELECT composition_title FROM Music_Compositions WHERE era_id = 2 ORDER BY composition_title ASC;
SELECT COUNT(composition_id) AS total_compositions FROM Music_Compositions WHERE era_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Musical_Eras JOIN Music_Compositions ON Musical_Eras.era_id = Music_Compositions.era_id;
SELECT DISTINCT era_name FROM Musical_Eras WHERE era_id IN (4, 5);
SELECT * FROM music_eras;
SELECT era_name FROM music_eras WHERE era_id = 1;
SELECT composition_name, era_id FROM music_compositions WHERE era_id = 2;
SELECT influence_id, influence_description FROM influences ORDER BY influence_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM influences WHERE composition_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM music_eras WHERE era_id = 1;
SELECT era_name, era_id FROM music_eras ORDER BY era_name DESC;
SELECT music_compositions.composition_name, music_eras.era_name FROM music_compositions JOIN music_eras ON music_compositions.era_id = music_eras.era_id;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_influences, music_compositions.composition_name FROM influences JOIN music_compositions ON influences.composition_id = music_compositions.composition_id GROUP BY influences.composition_id;
SELECT era_name, COUNT(*) AS total_compositions FROM music_eras JOIN music_compositions ON music_eras.era_id = music_compositions.era_id GROUP BY era_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Composers
SELECT composer_id, composer_name, composer_birthdate FROM Composers ORDER BY composer_birthdate DESC
SELECT composer_name, composition_title, composition_date FROM Composers JOIN Compositions ON Composers.composer_id = Compositions.composer_id
SELECT influence_description, composer_name FROM Influences JOIN Composers ON Influences.composer_id = Composers.composer_id
SELECT era_name, COUNT(composer_id) AS total_composers FROM MusicalEras JOIN Composers ON MusicalEras.era_id = Composers.era_id GROUP BY era_name
SELECT * FROM MusicalEras
SELECT composer_name, composer_birthdate, era_name FROM Composers INNER JOIN MusicalEras ON Composers.era_id = MusicalEras.era_id
SELECT composer_name, composition_title, composition_date FROM Composers JOIN Compositions ON Composers.composer_id = Compositions.composer_id
SELECT composer_name, influence_description FROM Composers INNER JOIN Influences ON Composers.composer_id = Influences.composer_id
SELECT era_name, COUNT(composer_id) AS composer_count FROM MusicalEras LEFT JOIN Composers ON MusicalEras.era_id = Composers.era_id GROUP BY era_name
SELECT * FROM Era;
SELECT composer_name, era_name FROM Composer INNER JOIN Era ON Composer.era_id = Era.era_id;
SELECT composition_name, composer_name, era_name FROM Composition INNER JOIN Composer ON Composition.composer_id = Composer.composer_id INNER JOIN Era ON Composer.era_id = Era.era_id;
SELECT influenced_composition_id, influencer_composition_id FROM Influence;
SELECT genre_name FROM Genre;
SELECT * FROM Era ORDER BY era_name DESC;

SELECT Composer.composer_name, Composition.composition_name FROM Composer INNER JOIN Composition ON Composer.composer_id = Composition.composer_id WHERE Composition.composition_name LIKE '%Sonata%' ORDER BY Composer.composer_name ASC;

SELECT Composition.composition_name, Composer.composer_name, Era.era_name FROM Composition INNER JOIN Composer ON Composition.composer_id = Composer.composer_id INNER JOIN Era ON Composer.era_id = Era.era_id WHERE Era.era_name = 'Baroque' ORDER BY Composition.composition_name ASC;

SELECT DISTINCT Composer.composer_name, COUNT(Composition.composer_id) AS composition_count FROM Composer INNER JOIN Composition ON Composer.composer_id = Composition.composer_id GROUP BY Composer.composer_name HAVING composition_count > 5 ORDER BY composition_count DESC;

SELECT Composition.composition_name, Composer.composer_name, Genre.genre_name FROM Composition INNER JOIN Composer ON Composition.composer_id = Composer.composer_id INNER JOIN Genre ON Composition.genre_id = Genre.genre_id WHERE Genre.genre_name = 'Classical' ORDER BY Composer.composer_name ASC, Composition.composition_name DESC;
